data.core package

Submodules

data.core.control module

Submodule that controls the execution of the game.

class data.core.control.Control(state_dict, start_state)[source]

Bases: object

Class that controls the game.

Parameters:

  • state_dict (dict[str, Type[State]]) – Dictionary containing all the states to be used in the game.

  • start_state (str) – The name of the state to start the game with.

event_loop()[source]

Passes events to the event manager.

main()[source]

Main loop of the game. Handles events, updates then renders objects.

quit()[source]

Sets running to False.

render()[source]

Renders current state, ticks the clock and flips the display.

update()[source]

Updates current state, checks for quit requests.

data.core.main module

Submodule that starts and runs the game.

Does not contain logic, this submodule only starts and facilitates running the game. Declares the state dictionary with every state in the game, initialises the Control class.

data.core.main.main()[source]

Runs the game.

data.core.prepare module

Prepares pygame by initializing all its modules and creating the display.

Additionally searches directories and identifies the paths to all the assets to be used in the game. Loads in fonts and spritesheets.

class data.core.prepare.Load(directory, *accept, exclude_dirs=None)[source]

Bases: object

Loads in files from specified directories.

Parameters:

  • directory (str) – The parent directory to start searching from. Subdirectories are also searched.

  • accept (str) – The file endings to search for.

  • exclude_dirs (list[str]) – Subdirectories to skip when searching for files.

class data.core.prepare.LoadSprites(directory)[source]

Bases: object

Loads in spritesheets from specified directories.

Parameters:

directory (str) – The directory to start searching from. Subdirectories are also searched.

data.core.prepare.parse_spritesheet(sprite_sheet)[source]

Parses a spritesheet using its associated json file.

Parameters:

sprite_sheet (str) – The sprite sheet file to get sprites from.

Return type:

dict[str, Surface]

Returns:

A dictionary containing the name of the sprite pointing to a subsurface of the spritesheet with the specific sprite on it.

data.core.utils module

Global utilities used by other submodules.

Contains custom type hints, dataclasses, Mouse button references, design pattern base classes, and descriptors.

class data.core.utils.CustomTypes[source]

Bases: object

Contains custom game type hints.

alignments

alias of Literal[‘left’, ‘right’, ‘center’, ‘block’]

input_types

alias of Literal[‘key’, ‘keydown’, ‘keyup’, ‘mouse’, ‘mousedown’, ‘mouseup’, ‘quit’]

rect_alignments

alias of Literal[‘topleft’, ‘midtop’, ‘topright’, ‘midleft’, ‘center’, ‘midright’, ‘bottomleft’, ‘midbottom’, ‘bottomright’]

class data.core.utils.Mouse[source]

Bases: object

Contains pygame style references to mouse buttons.

LEFTCLICK = 1
MIDDLECLICK = 2
RIGHTCLICK = 3
SCROLLDOWN = 5
SCROLLUP = 4
class data.core.utils.Observer[source]

Bases: ABC

An implementation of the observer design pattern in python.

Allows you to register an event to a handler so that the handler is called whenever the event is detected.

abstract deregister(event, handler)[source]

Deregisters the event from its handler.

is_registered(event, handler)[source]

Check if handler is bound to an event.

Return type:

bool

abstract notify(*args)[source]

Calls the registered handler.

abstract register(event, handler)[source]

Registers the event to a handler.

class data.core.utils.Singleton[source]

Bases: type

An implementation of the singleton design pattern in python.

Makes all classes that inherit from this class only able to have one instance of the class. Subsequent attempts to instantiate a new class just return the first initialised object.

class data.core.utils.SingletonABCMeta(name, bases, namespace, /, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Singleton, ABCMeta

class data.core.utils.Validator[source]

Bases: ABC

Descriptor parent class for validating a property in various ways.
